entries.description: Use "registry.k8s.io" instead of "k8s.gcr.io" for Kubernetes upstream images. It might be necessary to update firewall rules or mirror registries accordingly
Added UI and API support for configuring autoscaling on cluster nodes
Added support for defaulting vSphere tag category from seed when it is not specified in user cluster
Added support for Kubernetes v1.24.9, v1.23.15 and v1.22.17
Updated KubeVirt CSI driver operator version to v0.1.3
Updated to etcd 3.5.6 for Kubernetes 1.22+ to prevent potential data inconsistency issues during online defragmentation
Updated OpenStack Cinder CSI to v1.24.5, v1.23.4, and v1.22.2
Fixed duplicate SourceRange entries for front-loadbalancer Service
Fixed an issue where AllowedRegistry ConstraintTemplate was not being reconiciled by Gatekeeper
Fixed missing etcd metrics in Grafana etcd dashboards
Added priority for public IP over private IP in front LoadBalancer service
